question_text:
Question 16. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
MCQ (1M)
Question ID : 8232513110
Consider the following ANSI C program:
int main( )

PAGE
12

{ int a[4][5];
int i, j;
for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
for (J = 0; j < 5; j++)
a[i][j] = 10 * i + j;
printf ("%d",*(a[1] + 9));}
Find the output of the above problem
(A)
 20        
(B)
 24        
(C) 
30        
(D)
 14
explanation_text:
Sol. 
After the execution of program the content of the array will be
[0] [1] [2] [3] [4]
[0] 0 
1 
2 
3 
4
[1] 10 
11 
12 
13 
14
[2] 20 
21 
22 
23 
24
[3] 30 
31 
32 
33 
34
*(a[1] + 9) = a[2][4] = 24
